title: gowri nivaasA
sahitya:
gowri nivAsA karuNA vilAsA
krupA kaTAkshamu kuripincu
(gowri)

anupallavi

sowri rAja hita munijana sArva
bhowmAdi sEvita sadAshiva
(gowri)

caraNam

amala kamala karpagAmbika hrudaya
kamalamunElina karuNAlaya
sumalayamArutamu nu minco mAdhurya
kOmaLa salalita gAnAmruta priya
(gowri)
